template.template: Template Module Windows users by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template Module Windows users by Zabbix agent
template.description: Get a total of logged-in users in the system.

item.name: Number of logged in users
item.key: wmi.getall[root\cimv2,select SessionId from Win32_Process where Name like '%explorer.exe%']
item.description: The number of users who are currently logged in.

template.template: Template Module Windows users by Zabbix agent active
template.name: Template Module Windows users by Zabbix agent active
template.description: Get a total of logged-in users in the system.

item.name: Number of logged in users
item.key: wmi.getall[root\cimv2,select SessionId from Win32_Process where Name like '%explorer.exe%']
item.description: The number of users who are currently logged in.
